add new customer: update customer - change fluid option to Optional
update customer - change fluid option to Required
update customer - change admin for this customer (newadmin@US.THEWG.COM)
update customer - change customer name (THE WARRANTY GROUP - new name)
update customer - change AT warranty (12 Month/12,000 Mile Warranty)
update customer - change TC warranty (36 Month/100,000 Mile Warranty)
update customer - change group name (Group name)
